named-native-query.name: DatosProveDto.ofertaGlobal
named-native-query.query: SELECT ROWNUM as idRow, NOMBRE_DEPARTAMENTO as departamento, RAZON_SOCIAL as razonSocial, DESCRIPCION_RUBRO as descripcionRubro, NOMBRE_PRESENTANTE as nombreRepresentante, NUMERO_NIT as nitRepresentante, CAPACIDAD_ACREDITADA as capacidadCalificada, NUMERO_DUI as duiRepresentante, NIT_EMPRESA as nitSociedad, fecha_modificacion as fechaModificacion, id_rubro_interes as idRubroInteres, id_anho as idAnho FROM VW_RPT_CABECERA_OFERTA_GLOBAL WHERE nit_empresa=?1 and id_rubro_interes=?2 and id_anho=?3

named-native-query.name: Proveedor.MunicipiosDeIntegeres
named-native-query.query: select rownum as idRow, mun.id_municipio as idMunicipio, mun.codigo_departamento as codigoDepartamento, depa.nombre_departamento || ' : ' ||mun.codigo_municipio|| ' - ' || mun.nombre_municipio as nombreMunicipio, mun.codigo_municipio as codigoMunicipio from municipio mun inner join departamento depa on depa.codigo_departamento = mun.codigo_departamento inner join DIS_MUNICIPIO_INTERES dis on mun.id_municipio = dis.id_municipio where mun.id_municipio is not null and dis.ID_CAPA_DISTRIBUCION = ?1 and dis.estado_eliminacion = 0 order by mun.id_municipio

named-native-query.name: Proveedor.DeclaracionJurada
named-native-query.query: select rownum as idRow, descripcion_rubro as rubro, anho as anho, razon_social as razonSocial, nombre_presentante as representanteLegal, nit_empresa as nitEmpresa, direccion_completa as direccionEmpresa, numero_nit as nitRepre, numero_dui as duiRepre, domicilio as direccionRepre, fecha_modificacion as fechaModificacion from VW_RPT_DECLARACION_JURADA2 where nit_empresa=?1 and id_rubro_interes=?2 and id_anho=?3

named-native-query.name: Proveedor.NotificacionOfertaProv
named-native-query.query: select id_empresa as idEmpresa, razon_social as razonSocial, numero_nit as numeroNit, descripcion_rubro as descripcionRubro, programa, ubicacion_per as ubicacionPer, domicilio, telefono_per as telefonoPer, direccion_completa as direccionCompleta, telefono_local as telefonoLocal, nombre_departamento as nombreDepartamento, id_anho as idAnho from vw_prov_notificacion_cabecera where id_empresa=?1 and id_anho=?2 and id_rubro_interes=?3
